metaData.title: Folder Art Generator
metaData.description: Folder Art is an online tool designed for macOS and Windows 11, allowing you to customize folder icons, add text, select icon styles, and choose folder styles. No software downloads required; easily create personalized folder icons and save them for use.
metaData.keywords: macOS folder icon, Windows folder icon, custom folder icon, folder customization tool, Folder Art, online folder icon generator, icon presets, folder skins, online folder icon creation

HowToUse.title: How to use {os} ?

windows.1: Select an icon from the gallery or upload your own.
windows.3: Right-click the folder you want to customize and choose Properties.
windows.4: Go to the Customize tab and click Change Icon.
windows.5: Browse to the location of your downloaded icon and select it.
windows.6: Click OK, then Apply, and OK again to confirm.

HowToUse.windowsDescription: How to Apply a Custom Folder Icon on Windows
HowToUse.macosDescription: How to Apply a Custom Folder Icon on macOS

macos.1: Select an icon from the gallery or upload a custom one.
macos.3: In the menu bar, choose File > Get Info.
macos.4: Drag and drop the custom icon into the top-left corner of the info panel.
